CustomField.description:
Identifies user's role in a way that makes more sense to business users. If display name (UserRole.RollupDescription) is not specified on user's role, use role name (UserRole.Name) instead. For users with out an assigned role shows "other" as the display name.
Included in search layout for User as the secondary field so that it is used on user search results and more importantly on user lookup search results.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Identifies user's role in a way that makes more sense to business users.
CustomField.label: Role Name
